name: First Person Game
body:
### The Project
This project is mainly to learn how to use Three.js and WebGL, it is supposed to be a First Person Shooter.

### Features
There is a first person character that can walk around the world, some basic collision, objects and a skybox, also some skeletons of objects for future use.

### Upcoming
Add hands/weapons/projectiles.

Add basic AI.

Add some meshes.

### Authors and Contributors
Guðjón Kári Jónsson (@gudkjon)

Sturla Freyr Magnúnsson (@Stullif)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
